events.name: EV Battery Recycling and Reuse
events.wd_description: Three main methods are used in lithium-ion recycling and reuse: pyrometallurgical, hydrometallurgical, bioleaching, and re-manufacturing.
events.description: Three main methods are used in lithium-ion recycling and reuse: pyrometallurgical, hydrometallurgical, bioleaching, and re-manufacturing.

events.name: pyrometallurgical
events.wd_description: Employs extreme heat to transform metal oxides into cobalt, copper, iron, and nickel alloys.
events.description: Employs extreme heat to transform metal oxides into cobalt, copper, iron, and nickel alloys.

events.name: hydrometallurgical
events.wd_description: Uses aqueous solutions to leach targeted metals out from the cathode substance.
events.description: Uses aqueous solutions to leach targeted metals out from the cathode substance.

events.name: bioleaching
events.wd_description: Uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals, but it is challenging because the bacteria need a substantial amount of time to grow and are easily susceptible to contamination.
events.description: Uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals, but it is challenging because the bacteria need a substantial amount of time to grow and are easily susceptible to contamination.

events.name: Special characteristics of EV battery CLSC
events.wd_label: Special characteristics of EV battery CLSC
events.wd_description: Highlighting the unique characteristics of the EV battery closed-loop supply chain model and its implications for manufacturers and remanufacturers.
events.description: Highlighting the unique characteristics of the EV battery closed-loop supply chain model and its implications for manufacturers and remanufacturers.

events.name: Unique characteristics
events.wd_description: Identifying the unique characteristics of the EV battery closed-loop supply chain, such as the ability to reuse batteries before recycling.
events.description: Identifying the unique characteristics of the EV battery closed-loop supply chain, such as the ability to reuse batteries before recycling.

events.name: Implications for manufacturers
events.wd_description: Discussing the implications of the closed-loop supply chain model for EV battery manufacturers, including strategies for optimizing profit.
events.description: Discussing the implications of the closed-loop supply chain model for EV battery manufacturers, including strategies for optimizing profit.

events.name: Implications for remanufacturers
events.wd_description: Discussing the implications of the closed-loop supply chain model for EV battery remanufacturers, including strategies for maximizing reuse and recycling efficiency.
events.description: Discussing the implications of the closed-loop supply chain model for EV battery remanufacturers, including strategies for maximizing reuse and recycling efficiency.

events.name: Need for Government Support
events.description: To sustain the recycling business, government support is vitally important.
